Items.Title: Application no. 20005023 HAM, an Urban Development Action Area Project, located at 525 West 151 Street, Council District no. 7, Borough of Manhattan.  This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant to Article 16 of the New York General Municipal Law, at the request of the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development and pursuant to Section 577 of the Private Housing Finance law for a partial tax exemption.
